entries.title_d: Spice pirates have attacked the researchers operating out of the Linear Miasma.  Move in to assist the scientists against the pirate agression.
entries.title: Endor System: The Ends of Understanding
entries.split_quest_alert: \#pcontrast3 Endor Station: \#pcontrast1 The next stop is the Declorian Territory, meeting area for the Zynt'aia Spice Pirates. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.quest_location_d: The confortation comes to a head not far from the heart of the nebula.
entries.quest_helpallies_d: Protect the scientists from the Zynt`aia Spice Guardians.
entries.quest_findbattle_d: Travel to the fight location quickly, forces have already engaged.
entries.found_loc: \#pcontrast3 Nav Computer: < \#pcontrast1 Engagement location locked in. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.enemies_win: \#pcontrast3 Endor Station: < \#pcontrast1 Much knowledge has been lost for this.  Our future will be a less enlightened place. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.enemies_remain: \#pcontrast3 An enemy craft has been destroyed, %DI remain.
entries.autorewardbody: Completion Bonus: The Ends of Understanding (5000)
entries.allies_win: The spice pirates have been driven back.
entries.allies_remain: \#pcontrast1 An allied craft has been destroyed, %DI remain.
entries.allies_arrived: \#pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < \#pcontrast1 Friendly IFF signatures detected. \#pcontrast3 >
